name: ru
description:
ru - 19th in "focus" (aa, uu, ff, au, rr, ao, rl, sp, th, ki, ci, sn, lo, ba, ov, sh, fi, do, ru & ti)

When you're ready, start rubbing the screen. A silly, fun and addicting past time. Challenge the world and see how fast you can rub up and down, anywhere on the screen.

Can you top the leaderboard?

Thanks for all your support, I hope you're enjoying the "focus" series thus far.

Handmade in Australia,
General Adaptive
